other_tests.findings: necrosis, heterogeneous lymphoid cells, and epithelioid histiocytes suggestive of granulomatous inflammation
Granulomatous tissue; diagnosis of diffuse large-B-cell lymphoma, EBV-positive

94 white cells, with 32% lymphocytes, 8% neutrophils, 40% monocytes, and 19% large cells with nucleoli and basophilic cytoplasm; results pending for flow cytometry, cytologic examination, and cultures
